statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x , 2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 4 , 2 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 4 , 4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x , -18 \, x^{3} - 26 \, x^{2} - 23 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
